concept.title: Quantum Grid
concept.description: A strategic, top-down 2D arcade game where players battle across a dynamic tic-tac-toe grid, utilizing cosmic power-ups and tactical maneuvering to outwit opponents.
concept.theme: Cosmic / Sci-Fi with a touch of retro arcade
concept.objective: To achieve three in a row (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally) on the game grid, while strategically using power-ups and avoiding opponent's traps.
mechanics: Grid-based movement: Players move their 'Cursor' (representing their mark) across the 3x3 tic-tac-toe grid.
Mark placement: Players can place their mark ('X' or 'O') on an empty grid square their Cursor is currently on.
Power-up activation: Players can collect and activate unique power-ups that alter gameplay.
Turn-based gameplay: Players and AI opponents take turns placing their marks.
player_abilities: Cursor Dash: A quick, short-range burst movement to reposition the Cursor.
Mark Swap: Once per game, allows the player to swap the positions of two of their already placed marks on the grid.
Power-up Shield: Briefly renders the player immune to opponent's disruptive power-ups.

enemies.name: Rival AI
enemies.behavior: Attempts to win by placing marks strategically, prioritizes blocking player wins, and uses power-ups to disrupt player strategy.

enemies.name: Warp Drone
enemies.behavior: A mobile hazard that periodically moves across empty grid squares, preventing marks from being placed on its current location. It can be temporarily disabled by certain power-ups.

powerups.name: Quantum Shift
powerups.effect: Instantly teleports the player's Cursor to any empty square on the grid.

powerups.name: Graviton Pull
powerups.effect: Once activated, it pulls all opponent marks currently on the grid towards the center, potentially breaking their winning lines.

powerups.name: Void Bomb
powerups.effect: Clears all marks (both player and opponent) from a chosen 3x3 area of the grid.

powerups.name: Mark Duplicator
powerups.effect: Allows the player to place two marks in the same turn, on adjacent empty squares.

concept.level_progression: Levels increase in difficulty by introducing more complex AI opponent patterns, faster Warp Drones, and more frequent power-up spawns. Unlockable cosmetic themes for the grid and Cursor.
concept.scoring_system: Points are awarded for winning a round. Bonus points are given for winning with specific power-ups, achieving a quick win, or preventing the opponent from winning a crucial line. High scores are tracked and displayed.
concept.visual_style: A clean, neon-infused sci-fi aesthetic. The grid itself can be a pulsating energy field. Cursor and marks have subtle glow effects. Backgrounds feature abstract cosmic nebulae and digital patterns. Top-down perspective with a slight parallax effect for depth.
concept.sound_theme: An energetic synthwave soundtrack with electronic sound effects. Each action (moving, placing a mark, using a power-up) has distinct, satisfying audio cues. Power-up activations are accompanied by impactful, sci-fi-inspired sounds.

level_design.name: The Grand Opening
level_design.description: Welcome to the Quantum Grid! Your journey begins on a familiar 3x3 grid. Learn the ropes by outmaneuvering a simple AI and collecting essential power-ups. Don't let the grid get too cluttered!
